string.value: #b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.
Eliminate the aliens that are threatening the safety of Omega Sector and then rush over to #b#p2050012##k to report your progress. \n\n#o4230118# #r#a98471##k
There are a lot of aliens remaining, so don't let your guard down yet.
Wow, you are really amazing. I can't believe you went into the alien hideout. In any case, something urgent has happened to Agent M... Do you want to hear about it?
Agent M discovered that the alien life most dangerous to Omega Sector is the Ultra Grays. Yes, the same ones you can find all over the plac.
So eliminate #r100 #04230118#s#k to protect Omega Sector and deliver the news to #b#p2050012##k.
This is important for the safety of Omega Sector...
I thought I already told you to defeat #r100 #o4230118#s#k in order to protect Omega Center and deliver the news to #b#p2050012##k...
The alien that is the biggest threat to the Omega Sector is none other than the #r#o4230118#s#k! Eliminating just #r100#k of them would make things so much better...
